resources.string:
"
FOR PUBLIC ACCOUNT.
" "

1.Tap on Open Instagram Button from top App Bar." "

2.Choose any image OR Video that you want to download on your smartphone then tap on three vertical dots." "

3.Choose Copy Share URL option." "

4.Now open this app and click on Paste Button." "

5.Click on Load Url Button." "

6.Cong…Its done !!!" "


FOR PRIVATE ACCOUNT.
" "

1.Open Instagram.com in your browser(PC) and log in to your account using Facebook Sign In or using your account credentials." "

2.Search for the person you want to download pictures. Make sure that you are his/her follower." "

3.After getting into their profile, Click on the picture OR Video you want to download. " "

4.After clicking on the picture/Video, the picture pops out into a frame. Now place your mouse on the picture and right-click on it. Select the option Inspect." "

5.Press ctrl+F and enter jpg or mp4 for image or video url respectively. Hit enter Button from keyboard." "

6.Copy the link." "

7.Now open this app and click on Paste Button." "

8.Click on Load Url Button." "

9.Cong… Its done !!!" "


Disclaimer :-
Plaese don't use app's feature without consent of your followers. Developer \@vikash isn't responsible for your action"
